Plot Hypergraph with Overlapping Genes Highlighted

Source: R/plot_hypergraph.R
plot_hypergraph.Rd

Visualizes a hypergraph where communities are hyperedges, highlighting overlapping genes between specified communities.

Usage

plot_hypergraph(
  large_communities,
  comm_indices = NULL,
  title = "Hypergraph with Overlapping Communities",
  key_genes = c("PRSS1", "PRSS2")
)

Arguments

large_communities

A list of communities, where each element contains the nodes of a community.

comm_indices

Integer vector, indices of communities to plot (default: all communities).

title

Character, title of the plot (default: "Hypergraph with Overlapping Communities").

key_genes

Character vector, additional genes to label (default: c("PRSS1", "PRSS2")).

Value

A ggraph plot object.
